entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
